## CloudDurableTestRunner.getOperation() method

Gets an operation by name, defaulting to the first occurrence (index 0).

This is a convenience method equivalent to calling `getOperationByNameAndIndex(name, 0)`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getOperation<TOperationResult = any>(name: string): DurableOperation<TOperationResult>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter

</th><th>

Type

</th><th>

Description

</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

name

</td><td>

string

</td><td>

The name of the operation to retrieve

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[DurableOperation](./durable-execution-sdk-js-testing.durableoperation.md)<!-- -->&lt;TOperationResult&gt;

An operation instance that can be used to inspect operation details

## Example

```typescript
const stepOp = runner.getOperation<string>("processData");
await stepOp.waitForData();
const details = stepOp.getStepDetails();
```
